# Slice

---
# The `happy` data frame

.center[
```{r echo = FALSE}
happy %>% 
  kbl %>% 
  kable_styling()
```
]
---
# `slice()`

.panelset[
```{r panelset = TRUE}
happy %>% 
  slice(1)
```
]
--
.panelset[
```{r panelset = TRUE}
happy %>% 
  slice(1:3)
```
]
---
# `slice_head()` and `slice_tail()`

.panelset[
```{r panelset = TRUE}
happy %>% 
  slice_head(n = 3)
```
]
--
.panelset[
```{r panelset = TRUE}
happy %>% 
  slice_tail(n = 3)
```
]
---
# `slice_sample()`

.panelset[
```{r panelset = TRUE}
happy %>% 
  slice_sample(n = 3)
```
]
--
.panelset[
```{r panelset = TRUE}
happy %>% 
  slice_sample(prop = 3/5)
```
]
---
# `slice_min()`

.panelset[
```{r panelset = TRUE}
happy %>% 
  slice_min(ladder_score)
```
]
--
.panelset[
```{r panelset = TRUE}
happy %>% 
  slice_min(ladder_score, n = 2)
```
]
---
# `slice_max()`

.panelset[
```{r panelset = TRUE}
happy %>% 
  slice_max(ladder_score)
```
]
--
.panelset[
```{r panelset = TRUE}
happy %>% 
  slice_max(ladder_score, n = 2)
```
]
